name: imperfect
description: many people today judge everything by physical standards, insulting if they are different, even though many people around us need help and support in order to gain confidence from the shortcomings they have, in fact it is a gift from God, no human being wants to be born imperfect , this painting depicts a figure with an imperfect body and is at the lowest point of his life due to a lot of rejection from society, his heart and mind feel empty, this painting becomes a space and an invitation to kindness, embrace, respect, and help in whatever condition.
